body.name: Air Wick Essential Mist Starter Kit, Diffuser + 1 Refill, Lavender and Almond Blossom, Air Freshener, Essential Oils
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 12 hrs 8 mins
features: FRAGRANCE: A divine blend of freshness and softness, the fresh aromacy of lavender wrapped with the delicate sweet and creamy floralcy of almond blossom brings a feeling of joy and serenity.
A MODERN FRAGRANCE EXPERIENCE: Redefine how you experience fragrance; Air Wick Essential Mist is the modern way to transform fragrance infused with natural essential oils into a mist
PORTABLE AND CORDLESS DESIGN: Its cordless design can move from room to room, with no need of being near an outlet; You can bring the power of the mist throughout your home
VALUE: Each refill provides up to 45 days fragrance based on low setting, no need to add water, each refill comes ready to use, easy to change out the refills

VARIETY: Several premium fragrances available in refills: Lavender and Almond Blossom, Fresh Water Breeze, Mandarin and Sweet Tangerine, Coconut and Pineapple, Peony and Jasmine, Sandalwood, Sweet Melon and Vanilla; seasonal scents like Apple Cinnamon Medley, Pumpkin Spice, Sweet Fruit and Nutmeg, Brown Sugar and Vanilla, Fresh Pine and Juniper and, our Aroma range with Happiness, Sleep, Unwind and Rejuvenate
body.description: Discover the more natural and premium fragrance infused with natural essential oils diffused by mist with Air Wick Essential Mist diffuser. It transforms fragrance infused with natural essential oils into a gentle mist that surrounds your home. Several premium fragrances available in refills: Lavender and Almond Blossom, Mandarin and Sweet Tangerine, Coconut and Pineapple, Peony and Jasmine, Sandalwood, Sweet Melon and Vanilla; seasonal scents like Apple Cinnamon Medley, Pumpkin Spice, Sweet Fruit and Nutmeg, Brown Sugar and Vanilla, Fresh Pine and Juniper and, our Aroma range with Happiness, Sleep, Unwind and Rejuvenate.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 1. Twist to remove base cover and insert 3 AA batteries 2. Remove refill cap. Firmly push the refill bottle upright until you hear it click in, and the top of the refill is secured in place 3. Replace the base cover back onto the device 4. Turn on device with slider (blue light will flash), select intensity setting

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy and great to make a room smell good. I have it for a year and still working.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best smelling purchase
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product. The smell is heavenly. It works perfectly and goes off when I’m ready for bed. The power of turning it on for a certain time is great. It’s well made and it doesn’t leak or break after a couple of uses. It’s a pleasant light scent that puts you right to sleep. It’s easy to setup. The blue light tells you when it’s misting. Very Stable product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mind blown at this small device
reviews.reviewText: Wow I just received this and already turned it on and was amazed how quickly it smelled up my apt with a nice clean scent 👌🏼 best part is that it’s quiet 🙌🏼 I’m buying more so I can also put into my bf place :) don’t hesitate on this purchase, just do it. You’ll be pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars One or more batteries may be dead
reviews.reviewText: I loved the idea if this aromatherapy diffuser, but when I got it it wouldn't do anything. I put it together according to the directions, but it never showed the blue light. I decided it had to be the batteries, so I put three new batteries in and it worked fine. I thought it might just have been that one of the original batteries was dead so I exchanged the old and the new until the blue light went on and the mist came out. So it turned out that one of the original batteries was dead. But otherwise, it's a great idea and I'm looking forward to sleeping more soundly now that there'll be fresh scents floating around my bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars uhmmmm BUY THIS NOW!
reviews.reviewText: I admittedly don’t write good reviews often, I usually only take my time if I need to tell people how bad a product is. I don’t usually go out of my way to tell people how great a product is but listen, buy this. You need it.I’m BIG on home fragrance. I’ve definitely wasted a lot of money on things that didn’t work. I use wax melts, incense sticks, candles, wall plug ins, sprays, etc. We recently shampooed our carpets and it unfortunately brought up old pet smells that we are now having to tackle. But my whole living room and kitchen area smelt like a… excuse me… pile of dog s***. It was absolutely disgusting and while in the process of trying to fix the smell in the carpet, I’ve been lighting candle after candle, wax melts, sprays, you name it and I did it. But you could still smell the awful smell. I saw this oil diffuser while doing my Amazon fresh order and figured why not try it? I’ve been let down by at least 5 oil diffusers so why not give another a try. It came with the batteries it needed and a bottle of oil. Super easy to start up and use. I put it on the lowest setting and placed it by my front door. I wasn’t expecting it to work well so I figured if it works at all, at least let it work where people are entering my home so they’re greeted by something a little more pleasant than my carpet.Shortly after turning it on I had to leave and came back about an hour later and you guys, my house smells amazing. My whole front area. I have a fairly small house but my living room/kitchen area is about half of my home and this whole area smells amazing! And maybe I’ve become a bit nose blind in the last 2 days since the smell resurfaced from my carpet but I can no longer smell it.I cannot recommend this product enough!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price and product
reviews.reviewText: Works great and refresh’s the room I’m obsessed with these I bought for every room in the house

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I was really excited about this, but the smell fades right away
reviews.reviewText: I was really excited about this because I can't use a plug-in for my bathroom. I have it in the highest setting but I couldn't smell it from day one. My bathroom is really small, so it's not the size. I can see it come out, I can smell it for about 2 seconds and that's it. I will have to find another solution for my bathroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this scent!
reviews.reviewText: First off, I like the Air Wick Essential Mist system itself: a little battery powered thing that you can put just about anywhere. The little bottles are real easy to replace, though they could last longer. Of course, I manually goose mine to get a hit of scent any time I'm near the thing, so...See, this particular scent (Lavendar and Almond Blossom) makes me irrationally happy. I just love it. Maybe you will too, maybe not. The only other scent I've tried is one labeled as "Happy", which is pleasant enough, citrus/peach sorta, but pales in comparison to Lavendar and Almond Blossom, the single best air freshener scent ever made, for me anyway.

I am really enjoying this miniature diffuser! I had been eyeing oil diffusers ... but they are a bit more of an investment than I was willing to invest in at the time. Then I saw this product - which is very affordable and decided to give it a go. I am very happy I did! I have tried five scents so far and they are all gorgeous! The smell is quite potent so I just turn on the machine when I want to freshen up a room. Let it run for maybe an hour, then shut it off again and the room smells great again. It does gobble up batteries pretty good, so I find this to be a good compromise to letting it just run day and night. A great little buy in my opinion. Give it a try. :)

reviews.reviewTitle: Producto Bueno pero demasiado caro en la página
reviews.reviewText: El producto es bueno pero excesivamente caro , me dio mucha sorpresa ver en heb y Home Depot costara muchísimo menos de cómo lo compre en la página , sinceramente se sentí estafada con el precio que me lo vendieron
Awesome. Size is perfect for office desk.Diffuse the fragrant accordingly and soothing while working. Thumb up.
I am enjoying the lovely lavender scent. It is kept in a well ventilated area though on a the lowest setting and that seems to work very well.

reviews.reviewTitle: Timer makes zero sense for WFH
reviews.reviewText: The smell is okay, although it does smell more chemical than natural if you are near it when it discharges.The don't last long. The bottles/refills are not full, and the portion that absorbs the liquid does not reach the bottom of the bottle, so it's not efficient is getting all the liquid out. They were supposed to last for 45 days on low. I get closer to 30. And they burn through batteries like crazy. It would be best to use rechargeable, as I change the batteries almost as much as I change the fragrance bottles.But the worst: The timer makes no sense for working from home. It's on 8 hours, off 16. There is no way to change that. If I work an 8 hour shift, I have about 1 hour before and 7 hours after. Meaning only 50% of my day is covered by this. 8 hours off, when I'm asleep and don't need it, would make more sense. The only way to accommodate might be to maybe have 2 side-by-side, and have them cycle? But hardcoding the timer feels like a flaw where there should have been adjustable. If I could do half stars, this would be closer to a 3.5. It's just "okay".
